title: The post-boy rob'd of his mail, or, The pacquet broke open consisting of five hundred letters to persons of several qualities and conditions, with observations upon each letter / publish'd by a gentleman concern'd in the frolick.
author: Gildon, Charles, 1665-1724.
notes: Wrongly attributed to John Dunton--NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Based in part on some letters of Ferrante Pallavicino. cf. Gildon,  Robinson Crusoe examin'd and criticis'd, ed. by Dottin (1923) p. 9--NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Imperfect: tightly bound and stained, with print showthrough and loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
